(Occasionally also in [[Aspect ratio (image)#16:9 standard|16:9]]) | broadcast area = | headquarters = | web = http://www.k2tv.it/ | terr serv 1 = [[Digital terrestrial television in Italy|Digital]] | terr chan 1 = [[Logical channel number|LCN]] 41 | sat serv 1 = [[Hot Bird|Hot Bird 8]] | sat chan 1 = 12322 / 27500 / 3/4 H | sat serv 2 = [[Atlantic Bird|AtlanticBird 1]] | sat chan 2 = 12515 / 17455 / 3/4 H | sat serv 3 = [[Sky Italia]] | sat chan 3 = Channel 632 | adsl serv 1 = [[TV di FASTWEB]] | adsl chan 1 = Channel 66 }} '''K2''' is an [[Italy|Italian]] children's television channel. The network was initially launched as [[Fox Kids|Fox Kids Italy]] in 2002, before being renamed K2 in 2005.
